Name: TV Episode
Description: This type is for individual episodes of a TV program. This includes episodes of a mini-series. Note that for two-part episodes, each part should be a separate TV Episode topic; if a topic for the whole of the two-part episode is additionally needed, use the type Multipart TV episode.

Properties.Name: Original air date
Properties.Description: The date this episode was first broadcast. Leave blank if it was never broadcast.

Properties.Name: Episode number
Properties.Description: Number of this episode within its season

Properties.Name: Season
Properties.Description: The season this episode appeared in (the typical formats are "Series Name, Season X" or "Season X, Series Name).

Properties.Name: Season number
Properties.Description: The season number of the TV program to which this episode belongs.

Properties.Name: Series
Properties.Description: The name of the television series this is an episode of.

Properties.Name: Songs
Properties.Description: Music that is played during the episode.

Properties.Name: Original Broadcast Rating
Properties.Description: The rating of this TV episode when it was originally broadcast.

Properties.Name: Filming location(s)
Properties.Description: Location(s) where this TV episode was filmed.
